summary: This is an email chain from September 2021 between attorney Stuart Kaplan and a federal prosecutor's office. Kaplan states he has been retained by a retired FBI Special Agent who has been subpoenaed to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The email raises concerns about the agent's ability to prepare for testimony without access to certain notes and references a prior OPR interview.

persons.name: Stuart Kaplan
persons.context: Managing partner of a law firm who has been retained by a retired FBI Special Agent subpoenaed in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. He is communicating with the prosecutor's office about his client's concerns.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case 'United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell' pending in the Southern District of New York, for which a retired FBI agent has been subpoenaed to testify.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the subject of the investigation about which the retired FBI agent was interviewed by the Office of Professional Responsibility.

connections.description: Kaplan states he has been 'formerly retained' by the retired FBI Special Agent to represent her in connection with her subpoena to testify in the Maxwell case.
The retired FBI agent has been subpoenaed to testify in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
The agent was interviewed under oath by the Office of Professional Responsibility regarding her recollection of events from the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

events.title: Attorney emails prosecutor about witness concerns
events.description: Stuart Kaplan emails a federal prosecutor's office to coordinate a call and formally notify them of his representation of a retired FBI agent subpoenaed in the Maxwell case, raising concerns about her ability to prepare for testimony.

events.title: Retired FBI agent subpoenaed in Maxwell case
events.description: A retired FBI Special Agent has been subpoenaed to testify in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell pending in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: OPR interview of retired FBI agent
events.description: Prior to her retirement, the FBI agent was interviewed under oath by the Office of Professional Responsibility regarding her recollection of events from the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

locations: Southern District of New York (SONY, likely a typo for SDNY)
keyFacts: A retired FBI Special Agent involved in the Jeffrey Epstein investigation has been subpoenaed to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.

The agent's attorney, Stuart Kaplan, raises concerns that she cannot properly prepare for testimony because she has not been given a copy of the '1A notes' that were used to prepare an FD-302 report she may testify about.

The retired agent was previously interviewed under oath by the FBI's Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) regarding her recollection of events from the Epstein investigation, just prior to her retirement.
The email indicates ongoing legal coordination and evidence disclosure issues in the Maxwell case as of September 2021.
The identities of the prosecutor, the retired FBI agent, and other cc'd recipients (FBI, NY) are redacted in the document.
